text: aur yadi pratyek vyakti ke paas, jisane atyaachaar kiya hai, jo kuchh dharatee mein hai, sab aa jaaye, to ve avashy use arthadand ke roop mein dene ko taiyaar ho jaayega aur jab ve us yaatana ko dekhenge, to dil hee dil mein pachhataayenge aur unake beech, nyaay ke saath nirnay kar diya jaayega aur unapar atyaachaar nahin kiya jaayega
